item.title: Creating Uniform Portgroups on VSphere Distributed Switch With Ansible
item.description: If you are a vSphere administrator managing environments with multiple clusters and vSphere Distributed Switches, then you are probably aware that naming portgroups can sometimes be quite a challenge. Especially when similar portgroups have to exist on more than one vSphere Distributed Switch (VDS), because you canâ€™t have duplicate portgroup names within one vCenter. To avoid clutter you want to create those portgroups in an uniform and automated way. Well, at least i do.
